column1: Rare Progressive Liver Disease - Primary Biliary Cirrhosis
column2: saltro, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Caregiver)
column9: Took for about a  year for general disease progression. Stopped because of chronic diarrhea.  Deteriorated for several years to severly ill, needing Liver soon. Was restarted on med for general purpose. Very surprised at body response.. 100% improvement in memory problems, energy, overall ability to perform my own ADLs. Had not worked outside in yard for a couple years. Now back to 50% activities before illness.  Problem, SEVER MUSCLE CRAMPING, (Not related to Actigall ), Itching still driving my nuts.  I've tried everything and nothing seems to work..HELP!
